version_description:
Alarm Clock HD: your daily companion
- bug fixes
- UI tweaks
- missing translations added

Fall asleep to your favourite music with Alarm Clock HD!
• if the app is closed, no worries! Your set alarms will still go off, through local notifications
• UI tweaks

Fall asleep to your favourite music with Alarm Clock HD!
• stability improvements
• brand new screenshots to give a better impression of the features of Alarm Clock HD

-- WAKE UP YOUR WAY! --
• Stay updated: the Twitter integration now works if you connect to your Twitter account for the first time
• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the App

-- WAKE UP YOUR WAY! --
• There was a problem with launching the app when your location was turned off. This has now been fixed.

-- WAKE UP YOUR WAY! --
• General fixes and improvements. We're so original

• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the app.

我们始终欢迎您提出宝贵意见和建议。 如有有任何建议或问题，请发送电子邮件至： feedback@impalastudios.com。 如果您喜欢这些变更，请在 App Store 中为我们评分并撰写评论。
• Thanks for using 闹钟! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

We've listened to your feedback and have granted your request! Check out the new design we've worked hard on. We hope you like it as much as we do!
Furthermore:
• you can now use existing iTunes Music playlists for your sleep timer/music alarms

We've listened to your feedback and have granted your request! Check out the new design we've worked hard on. We hope you like it as much as we do!
Furthermore:
• you can now use existing iTunes Music playlists for your sleep timer/music alarms

• 謝謝您使用 高清 闹钟 ! 為了讓我們的 App 更方便您使用，我們定期在 App Store 提供更新。
• 我们发现了若干错误并搞定了它们！

• 我们修复了一些小错误，以提高应用的稳定性和性能。

我们始终欢迎您提出宝贵意见和建议。 如有有任何建议或问题，请发送电子邮件至： feedback@impalastudios.com。 如果您喜欢这些变更，请在 App Store 中为我们评分并撰写评论。

• 我们修复了一些小错误，以提高应用的稳定性和性能
• 此版本包含缺少的翻译
• 我们发现了一些错误并搞定了它们！
• 謝謝您使用  高清 闹钟 !  為了讓我們的 App 更方便您使用，我們定期在 App Store 提供更新。

• Stop/Snooze button will appear on your clock face screen
• Snooze timer will appear in the button after you selected the snooze function
• Support landscape on iPhone
• Added FAQ
• Sleeptimer will now fade out its volume on finish
• Batte

• We've fixed the bug that disabled the snooze function
• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the app.

We fixed a bug which for subscribed users caused:
• ads still showing
• an incomplete Twitter feed
• We update our app regularly to fix small bugs that you wouldn’t necessarily notice
• We’ve fixed a crash occurring in the app while running on iOS 12
• Yes, we’ve added new languages! -Danish, Finnish, Norwegian and Portuguese
• 我们的主要目标是不断改进，每次更新都能让您的体验更好。• 此版本包含小错误修复。

• We’ve crushed an annoying bug which caused the displayed time zone in Japan of the Alarm Clock to not work properly.

Thank you for using Alarm Clock!
• This version contains minor bug fixes
• We update our app regularly to fix small bugs that you wouldn’t necessarily notice

Thank you so much for using Alarm Clock! In this version we've fixed the following bugs:
• A bug which made some users not able to silence the alarm;
• A bug about the warning "Alarm won't sound";
• A bug which appeared within the location pe
• We’ve crushed an annoying bug which caused the alarm/sound of the Alarm Clock to not work properly.
• We've fixed an issue where the app crashed on the latest iPad Pro models

Thank you for using Alarm Clock!
• This version contains minor bug fixes

Thank you for using Alarm Clock!
• bug fixes and performance enhancements
• We’ve crushed an annoying bug which caused the displayed time zone in Japan of the Alarm Clock to not work properly.

感谢您一直以来的支持！如您有任何想法和建议请通过邮箱feedback@impalastudios.com联系我们！

叮铃！>本次BUG修复更新！
我们修复了闹钟声音的BUG，该BUG导致闹钟使用默认提示音而不能使用您的音效，音乐，或是播放列表。
对我们的APP有改进的提议吗？欢迎通过邮箱feedback@impalastudios.com联系我们，分享您的点子和建议！

有什么变化？ 性能改进，小错误修复旨在增强您的体验并
我们已经更新了数据安全连接以保护个人数据。
